def_cn: 特许经营权;专卖权;经销权
def_en: A franchise is an authority that is given by an organization to someone, allowing them to sell its goods or services or to take part in an activity which the organization controls.
If a company franchises its business, it sells franchises to other companies, allowing them to sell its goods or services.

def_cn: (尤指选举议会的)选举权
def_en: Franchise is the right to vote in an election, especially one in which people elect a parliament.
